text: We are collecting money for an important children's charity.
it is great things to do
We would like you to help.
sure, but first i need to know for what need will i donate and what organization
It is for the charity Save the Children.  You are probably familiar with it.
yes, i have heard. How can i donate? in what way?
The researchers are looking for people to donate part of their payment for this study to this charity.  Can you contribute?
do you mean autopay from my payment checks ?
No, I think they mean reducing your payment for this study and giving the difference to Save the Children.
okey. i got it. i am interesting
Thank you, it will help out children in need.
yes. what do i need to do now to help?
I suspect that in the following part of the study, the researchers will ask how much of the money you want to donate.
okey. i understad you
How much money are you going to donate?  I have to admit these mturk studies don't even pay you enough for a cup of coffee.
i will donate now 5 dl
Wow, that's much more than the study is supposed to pay me!  Thank you.
i am alway happy to help
I believe this completes my part of the study.  Thank you again, and have a great day.
have a great day too
